faq.title: Got Questions? We've Got Answers!
faq.description: We know you might have some questions. That's why we've put together this list of common queries. If you don't see your question here, feel free to reach out!

items.q: Ok, but what exactly is this Voice AI?
items.a: Voice AI is an automated phone assistant that answers calls, qualifies leads, and books appointments 24/7.

items.q: Does it work with the tools we already use?
items.a: Yes. We integrate with CRMs, calendars, and marketing platforms you already use.
